title: SlaverWee (with Robert Hines)
itunes:title: SlaverWee (with Robert Hines)
description:
Was Kanye right when he said slavery was a choice? Langston and his guest Robert Hines (Lockdown Detroit on YouTube) entertain this unhinged conspiracy theory.
